io.sphere.sdk.products

Interface Product

  • All Superinterfaces:
    CreationTimestamped, DefaultModel<Product>, DefaultModelView<Product>, Identifiable<Product>, Referenceable<Product>, Timestamped, Versioned<Product>

    public interface Product
extends DefaultModel<Product>

    A sellable good.

    id=operationsOperations:

    • Create a product in SPHERE.IO with ProductCreateCommand.
    • Create a product test double with ProductBuilder.
    • Query a product with ProductQuery.
    • Update a product with ProductUpdateCommand.
    • Delete a product with ProductDeleteCommand.

    Consider to use ProductProjection for queries if you don't need the whole product data so you can safe traffic and memory.

    See Also:
    ProductProjection, Category, ProductType, ProductDiscount
